## Coming soon

This guide will show you how to diagnose and fix pipeline failures in production.

You will learn debugging techniques specific to Xorq's deferred execution model.

**What you'll accomplish:**
- Inspect expression graphs
- Use lineage for debugging
- Identify failure points
- Reproduce issues locally

**Prerequisites:**
- Failed pipeline to debug
- Understanding of Xorq execution model

Check back soon for the complete guide.
